about_the_game:
Run and manage the ultimate Board Game Cafe! Pick the board games you’ll offer, keep your staff happy, your customers happier and your board games in good condition as you manage the day-to-day running of your very own board game cafe.



Featuring a wide range of officially licensed board games lovingly modelled for you to unbox and set up for your customers to play, Board Game Cafe allows you to fully immerse yourself in running the board game cafe of your dreams. You’ll have to keep on top of your finances if you want your cafe to thrive!

Do you have what it takes to become a cardboard and coffee tycoon?

Build Your Dream Cafe

Design and customise your board game cafe from the ground up! Choose from a variety of themes, furniture, and decorations to create your ideal cafe. Expand your cafe by adding more tables, host themed game nights and more!

Curate an Extensive Game Library

Stock your shelves with a diverse collection of board games, from classics to modern favourites. Pick and choose the types of games you want to offer, to build (and then browse) the collection of your dreams!

Manage Your Cafe

Offer a wide range of snacks and treats to your customers by ordering in different foods and drinks, alongside hiring a team of skilled baristas and game gurus to provide top-notch service to your customers. Keep their mugs full and their game pieces organised to keep people coming back!

Unbox and Inspect Board Games

Experience the excitement of cracking open a new board game! Personally unbox board games, inspect their exquisite components, and organise them with care. Marvel at the intricate game pieces, beautifully designed boards, and detailed rulebooks - all lovingly recreated digitally in Board Game Cafe.

Build a Community

Foster friendships and rivalries among your regulars! Watch as stories unfold over dice rolls, and get to know the board game fans in your local community as they keep coming back.



Can’t wait to open your own board game cafe? Wishlist Board Game Cafe now to stay up to date with the latest news!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 6600 or AMD Ryzen 1600x
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTX 1060, 3 GB (Legacy: NVIDIA Geforce GTX 780, 4GB) or AMD RX 580, 4 GB (Legacy: AMD R9 290X, 4GB)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space

short_description: Welcome to Board Game Cafe, the ultimate destination for board game enthusiasts and cafe aficionados! Step into the shoes of a board game cafe owner in this unique management game, featuring officially licensed board games.
